name: Fight for your Light (adritake)
description:
One player attacks and the other deffends. Cooperate to beat all the enemies and open the next room!

The attacker player has limited shots so try to use them wisely to beat enemies and light the way.

The deffender player can absorb the attacker player's shots to fill again his shot bar. He can also deffend the attacker player by absorbing enemy shots.

Tired of defending? Absorb enough enemy shots, explode into flames to do an area attack and swap roles!

A game made in 48 hours with lots of love for the Malaga Jam 2022 :)

Controls:

Two gamepads are required to playe the game.

  • Left joystick - Movement
  • Right joystick - Aim
  • Right trigger - Shoot / Absorb
  • Right joystick press - Explode and swap roles
